tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Geofencing (
  geofence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  radius DOUBLE PRECISION
)

CREATE TABLE customer_data ( 
 customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 location_id INT, 
 customer_name VARCHAR(50), 
 contact_number VARCHAR(15), 
 CONSTRAINT fk_location FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES location_data(location_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  location GEOGRAPHY
);

CREATE TABLE proximity_analysis (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  store_id UUID,
  proximity_score FLOAT,
  proximity_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE visit (
	visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT,
	location_id INT,
	visit_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer(customer_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES location(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE geofence (
	geofence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	geofence_name STRING,
	radius FLOAT,
	latitude FLOAT,
	longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE proximity_analysis (
	analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	visit_id INT,
	geofence_id INT,
	proximity_distance FLOAT,
	proximity_result BOOLEAN,
	FOREIGN KEY (visit_id) REFERENCES visit(visit_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (geofence_id) REFERENCES geofence(geofence_id)
);
